inventory-control-suite.title: Essential for regulated warehouses
inventory-control-suite.feedback: The AI slotting suggestions alone saved us hundreds of hours each quarter. Cycle count variance dropped 18% within the first month.

inventory-control-suite.title: Audit prep is painless now
inventory-control-suite.feedback: We pipe QA holds from SAP into the dashboard and the compliance export nails every FDA ask. Would love deeper RFID integrations next.

quality-insights-pro.title: Supplier collaboration in one place
quality-insights-pro.feedback: Shared NCR workspace with vendors plus the copilot summaries cut containment time by 40%.

quality-insights-pro.title: Great start for AI QA
quality-insights-pro.feedback: Love the guided investigations. Would appreciate more templates for pharma LOT releases.

procurement-cockpit.title: Single source of supplier truth
procurement-cockpit.feedback: Our sourcing councils finally see risk scores, contracts, and AI negotiation briefs in one canvas. Massive uplift for quarterly planning.
